metadata.name: WALL #01
metadata.description:
**Description:**
Real photograph of rusty metal surface.

**General info:**
 Year: 2012
Technics: Hasselblad camera, Fujifilm Provia reversal film.  
Editions: 1  (1)
Size: 4000*4000 px  
Format: JPEG, maximum quality
TIFF: If you need 16-bit TIFF file just drop me a message.

**Licence:** 
I transfer all the copyrights regarding the NFT to any new owner with some limitations:
1/ The NFT can be resold infinitely in case it was not physically printed on any physical materials by one of the owners;
2/ If the NFT was printed by one of the owners he has right to resell the NFT only if the physical print is destroyed or being physically transferred to the next owner.

All images in this project you can see at [my site](https://andreybelkov.com/project/ferrum/).
